name: list-counter
description: This allows a list of items to be made and searched, and for users to click a button to add one to the count of items.

scripts.deploy-setup: terraform init && terraform workspace new production && terraform workspace new test
scripts.test: terraform workspace select test && mocha test/**/*.spec.js
scripts.deploy-test: terraform workspace select test && terraform apply
scripts.deploy-prod: terraform workspace select production && terraform apply
